column4: Tesla explores building Gigafactory in Europe: Wall Street Journal
column5: Tesla Inc  is in talks with authorities in Germany and the Netherlands to build its first major European factory  the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday  citing officials involved in the matter.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla explores building Gigafactory in Europe -WSJ
column5: July 30 Tesla Inc is in talks with authorities in Germany and the Netherlands to build its first major European factory  the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday  citing officials involved in the matter.
